game.name: Wizard's Oblation
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wizard's Oblation is a co-op horror for 1–4 wizards. Step through a portal and hunt for artifacts that hold unique spells.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wizard's Oblation is a co-op horror for 1–4 wizards. Step through a portal and hunt for artifacts that hold unique spells.
